description:
Joiner is 27, and you can tell he has likely been in shape all his life. He is actually naturally hairless, but did have his pubes shaved.
He used to play hockey, but now swims avidly, for which he is used to removing all his hair- which isn't much to begin with. He did grow back his pubes, though it kind of doesn't look like it. I looked close at his arm and leg hair and the dude just doesn't have much going on. His pubes actually are pretty much grown out!
I loved hanging out with Joiner. He is smart guy, business-minded, mature and what an amazing face and smile on him!
He has one those banana shaped dicks that is long and dangles and swings free, even when he is soft. A "Show-er"
Joiner loves to fuck girls reverse cowgirl style, which we agreed works perfectly with the bend in his dick.
And this guy was horny. Wanting to bust his nut the entire shoot.
In his final position he is facing away from the TV, his head practically upside down. I asked him if he wanted to move to a more comfortable position to bust in, but he said, "I'm ready to go right now"
So I scrambled and got my cameras ready, and true to his word, he was squirting out one major load in no time at all-despite the awkward upside down viewing angle.
He is down for a blowjob, so stay tuned for next week!
title: Joiner - Solo
